import { FaShoppingCart, FaHome } from "react-icons/fa"; // for cart and home icons export default function Home() { // ... your other code const fixedOrderBtnStyle = { position: "fixed", top: "50%", // vertically centered left: "10px", // small margin from left edge transform: "translateY(-50%)", padding: "12px 20px", background: "#6f4e37", color: "wheat", borderRadius: "25px", border: "2px solid #4b3621", fontFamily: "'Sansita Swashed', cursive", fontSize: "1.1rem", boxShadow: "0 4px 8px rgba(111, 78, 55, 0.4)", cursor: "pointer", transition: "background-color 0.3s ease", zIndex: 1000, }; const fixedBottomRightContainer = { position: "fixed", bottom: "20px", right: "20px", display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", gap: "15px", zIndex: 1000, }; const iconBtnStyle = { background: "#6f4e37", color: "wheat", border: "none", borderRadius: "50%", width: "50px", height: "50px", fontSize: "1.8rem", display: "flex", justifyContent: "center", alignItems: "center", cursor: "pointer", boxShadow: "0 4px 8px rgba(111, 78, 55, 0.5)", transition: "background-color 0.3s ease", }; return ( <> {/* Your existing layout */}

); }
